Detailed Description

The Mat3 class extends the Mat clas with a fixed 4x4 dimension.

See also:
Mat
Mat2
Mat3
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mat4::Mat4 (  ) [inline]

Sets dimension to 4 and initialises arrrays to hold 0 values.

void Mat4::toOpenGL ( float *  M )

Convert this Mat3 to a format which can be used by OpenGL.

This is a one dimensional array of 16 values, in column by column order.

Parameters:
MOpenGL array to populate with the values of this Mat4.
